```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
data_clean <- read_excel("UFML - 14 mei.xlsx", sheet = 2, skip = 1)
data_filtered <- data_clean %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Q24))

```



### UFML 1 Comparison interactive


```{r interactive-violin-a}

a <- ggplot(data_filtered, aes(x = factor(Q24), y = Identiteit_socialeverbinding, fill = factor(Q24))) + 
  geom_violin(trim = TRUE, color = "black", alpha = 0.7) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = "UFML 1 Identity and Social Bonding", 
       x = "", 
       y = "Frequency of use (1 = Never, 5 = Very often)", 
       fill = "Group") + 
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("1" = "Student", "2" = "Employed")) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("1" = "skyblue", "2" = "orange")) + 
  theme(legend.position = "none") + 
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.1, color = "black", outlier.shape = NA, position = position_dodge (width = 0.9)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(1, 5), expand = expansion(mult = c(0, 0.05))) + 
  stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "point", shape = 23, size = 2, fill = "red")

ggplotly(a)
```

### UFML 1 vs SPWB 1 Comparison interactive


```{r interactive-correlation-l}

data_filtered <- data_clean %>%
  filter(Q24 %in% c(1, 2))

data_filtered$Q24 <- factor(data_filtered$Q24, 
                            levels = c(1, 2), 
                            labels = c("Student", "Employed"))

l <- ggplot(data_filtered, aes(x = Autonomie, y = Identiteit_socialeverbinding, color = Q24)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c("Student" = "skyblue", "Employed" = "orange"),
    name = "Group"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:6, limits = c(1, 6)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = 1:5, limits = c(1, 5)) +
  labs(
    title = "Relation between Autonomy and Identity/Social connection per group",
    x = "Autonomy\n(1 = Strongly disagree, 6 = Strongly agree)",
    y = "Identity and Social connection\n(1 = Never, 5 = Very often)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(l)

```
